title: For purpose of existing "Carpet area"/ rehabilitation “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then Regulation but including the areas of balcony if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation
clause_text: For purpose of existing "Carpet area"/ rehabilitation “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then Regulation but including the areas of balcony if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation. This shall not be applicable for non-tenanted buildings.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
